Learning_EnrollmentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_Enrollment_HV_Data.description: Contains detailed data about the enrollment.

validation.validation: The Enrollment must be successfully complete for the Expiration Date to apply
validation.description: The Enrollment must be successfully complete for the Expiration Date to apply

validation.validation: You can't rescind the enrollment because you haven't submitted it yet.
validation.description: When rescinding, only existing Enrollments are supported.

validation.validation: You can't rescind this enrollment. You can only rescind imported enrollments.
You can't update or rescind this enrollment because it's already rescinded.
If Track Attendance is set on the course offering, the Attendance Status Reference is required for the enrollment.
Invalid Learner for Enrollment
validation.description: When updating an enrollment, the learner provided in the data element must be the same as the learner

validation.validation: Workday enables you to track grades and scores only at the course level, so you can't specify a score on the enrollment for the program.
validation.description: When the enrollment is for programs then the enrollment cannot have a score as programs don't have them.

validation.validation: Workday enables you to track grades and scores only at the course level, so you can't specify a grade on the enrollment for the program.
validation.description: When the enrollment is for programs then the enrollment cannot have a grade as programs don't have them.

validation.validation: The enrollment for the program must have a completion date.
validation.description: When the enrollment is for a program then it must have a completion date.

validation.validation: The learner isn't eligible to enroll in the learning content.
The version of the learning content on the enrollment must match an existing version.
Registration Date must be before Completion Date
validation.description: When adding a learning enrollment, the Registration Date must be before the Completion Date.

validation.validation: Completion Date must be in the past
validation.description: When adding or updating a learning enrollment, the Completion Date must be in the past.

validation.validation: If Make Lesson Mandatory is set on 1 or more lessons, the course enrollment must have a Completion Date. You can't specify a Completion Date if there aren't any mandatory lessons.
Specify the Time Unit if the Attendance Duration is greater than 0.
Attendance Duration must be greater than 0 if Time Unit is specified.
To specify time and attendance duration for an enrollment, ensure that the enrollment is in a course offering.
To specify time and attendance for an enrollment, ensure that the attendance status is set to Attended or Partially Attended.
To specify time and attendance duration for an enrollment, ensure that the course offering contains at least 1 instructor led lesson.
The Learning Content Reference cannot be changed when updating a complete enrolment.
You can't rescind enrollments that are associated with complete assignment records.
You can't specify an Expiration Date for the enrollment if there's no mandatory content or if the Completion Date isn't set.

description: Contain the request data to add or update learning enrollments through import.
